divs: Sighting Detailswalking out of my house with my brother he spotted it and because there was no sound for the height of it he shouted ufo. i looked up and saw it and thought the same because of the colour and the size of the object and there was no sound at all. then i got my phone out and filmed for 10 to 15 secs and then ran inside to get more witnesses. They came out and witnessed it too. i then disappeared in to the distance.
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Durham
There was one other sighting in Durham on or around January 4th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Flying around the height of a police helicopter no sound at all thats why it was suspicious
